title: Yi Ran Tang Vegetarian Buffet
description: A popular Buddhist vegetarian buffet where you contribute 5 yuan to a bucket and then help yourself to a variety of dishes. You are required to eat everything you take! Location is south of the intersection of Bo Ai Lu and the pedestrian street Bu Xing Jie (Water Street), on the East side of street. Once you get close you can follow the sound of Buddhist chanting played on a loudspeaker. Name in Chinese: 一然堂素食馆. Address in Chinese: 大理市古城红龙井红龙巷(近古玩一条街).
